quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.

quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: For me, I am driven by two main philosophies: know more today about the world than I knew yesterday and lessen the suffering of others. You'd be surprised how far that gets you.

quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: We are all connected; To each other, biologically. To the earth, chemically. To the rest of the universe atomically.

quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: We spend the first year of a child's life teaching it to walk and talk and the rest of its life to shut up and sit down. There's something wrong there.

quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not.

quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: ... there is no shame in not knowing. The problem arises when irrational thought and attendant behavior fill the vacuum left by ignorance.

quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: Knowing how to think empowers you far beyond those who know only what to think.

quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quotes.quote: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.

quotes.author: Richard Dawkins
quotes.quote: We are all atheists about most of the gods that humanity has ever believed in. Some of us just go one god further.

quotes.author: Richard Dawkins
quotes.quote: I am against religion because it teaches us to be satisfied with not understanding the world.

quotes.author: Richard Dawkins
quotes.quote: Science is interesting, and if you don't agree you can fuck off.

quotes.author: Richard Dawkins
quotes.quote: Do not indoctrinate your children. Teach them how to think for themselves, how to evaluate evidence, and how to disagree with you.

quotes.author: Richard Dawkins
quotes.quote: Religion is about turning untested belief into unshakable truth through the power of institutions and the passage of time.

quotes.author: Richard Dawkins
quotes.quote: Evolution could so easily be disproved if just a single fossil turned up in the wrong date order. Evolution has passed this test with flying colours.

quotes.author: Richard Dawkins
quotes.quote: The world and the universe is an extremely beautiful place, and the more we understand about it the more beautiful does it appear.

quotes.author: Richard Dawkins
quotes.quote: We are survival machines â€“ robot vehicles blindly programmed to preserve the selfish molecules known as genes. This is a truth which still fills me with astonishment.
